location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Morley, East India Company Resident at Bushire, and his assistant, George Green, to Captain Charles Elphinstone, Commander in Chief of the East India Company's marine force the Gulph of Persia [Persian Gulf]

mods.abstract: The letter informs the recipient that Captain John McKenly (of the Fancybomb ketch), Lieutenant John Hall (of the Tyger), Lieutenant John Birket (of the Dolphin), and Lieutenant Richard Field (of the Wolfe) are all being placed under his command.
